title: The Wellington Courtyard
description: Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, a shared lounge, and a garden, The Wellington Courtyard features accommodations in Tagaytay with free WiFi and pool views. This apartment provides free private parking and a shared kitchen.

title: Two Seasons Coron Island Resort
description: Presenting a haven in the middle ground of fine luxury and raw nature, Two Seasons Coron is also a turtle and giant clam sanctuary, and known as the first eco-friendly luxury island resort in Coron. Connecting islet, a vibrant house reef, lush tropical gardens, a 200-meter west-side beach, and another 200-meter east-side beach with mangroves.

title: Casa Kalaw
description: Nestled within Lio Tourism Estate, the first eco-masterplanned development in El Nido, Palawan. Casa Kalaw is a Filipino-inspired Boutique Resort which provides warmth, comfort and convenience for getaways and intimate gatherings.

title: Sangat Island Reserve
description: One of the best kept secrets of eco-conscious paradise-seekers and scuba diving enthusiasts throughout the world – features quaint, native-styled guest accommodations, a wide variety of on and off-resort activities and a professional, attentive staff singularly focused on making your stay a restful, adventure-filled and memorable one.

title: Hotel Busuanga Bay Lodge
description: Busuanga Bay Lodge is an elegant, boutique, resort hotel located on the island province of Palawan, a nature sanctuary known all over the world as the Philippine’s last ecological frontier. Busuanga Bay Lodge offers 41 units in total including 38 rooms and 3 private, two-bedroom villas.

title: Holiday Suites
description: As modern as it is comfortable, Holiday Suites Palawan is our response to both the local and international clamor for chic and comfortable accommodation. The combination of world-class sophistication and Filipino traditional value of hospitality was designed to provide you and your family.

title: Coron Westown Resort
description: Coron Westown Resort offers guests first class hotel rooms that blend Filipino culture and modern amenities in a total resort experience that is sure to tantalize the senses and relax the body. The resort is just 25 minutes from the airport by shuttle van and just 5 minutes from downtown Coron.

title: Asturias
description: Asturias Hotel Puerto Princesa is more than just a hotel; it is a haven to local and foreign visitors; an enjoyable place for a family bonding; a romantic getaway for every couple; and a respite for the hectic executive or entrepreneur and a portal to nature’s wonders for the adventurous tourist.

title: Hotel Aziza Paradise
description: Aziza aims to impress an excellent experience to each of its guests. Whether they’re in the city for a holiday or to hold a corporate event, visitors can be sure that this hotel in Puerto Princesa with swimming pool will live up to their expectation.  The hotel also houses a coffee shop and the Voda Bar.
